attributes.category: Health Care Professional or Association - HC001
attributes.comment:
I have been a management consultant for over 30 years to help health care systems improve their performance.
The idea of a "nation-wide provider directory" would be fabulous!

In order to incentivize Health Systems to use it, the directory should:
- cover not only MDs but all medical professions, e.g., DOs, RNs, Pharmacists, Therapists
- include licensure information (valid, suspended, expired...); licensing boards should post their information directly into the directory
- include their sanction data, spanning from reprimands to exclusions and loss of license, i.e., an important part of credentialing providers; not only licensing boards, but also OIG and CMS (especially State Medicaid) should post their information directly into the directory

This would make it so much easier - and much much cheaper - for health systems to manage the credentialing status of their providers.
